statements: SELECT * FROM asset_inventory;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value, asset_category FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_quantity > 10;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_category FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_location = 'Store Room';
SELECT asset_name, asset_quantity, asset_value FROM asset_inventory ORDER BY asset_quantity DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_location FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_category = 'Electronics' AND asset_quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_quantity > 10 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_category, asset_location FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_value < 5000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_location = 'Warehouse A' AND asset_quantity > 0;
SELECT asset_category, AVG(asset_value) AS average_value FROM asset_inventory GROUP BY asset_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_quantity, asset_value FROM asset_inventory WHERE asset_category IN ('Electronics', 'Furniture') ORDER BY asset_quantity ASC, asset_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Asset;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM Asset WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM Asset WHERE asset_type = 'Furniture';
SELECT asset_id, quantity, last_updated FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM Asset WHERE asset_type = 'Computer' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM Asset WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Inventory.quantity, Asset.asset_name FROM Inventory JOIN Asset ON Inventory.asset_id = Asset.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM Asset WHERE asset_id IN (SELECT asset_id FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5);
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_price, current_location FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, current_location FROM assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, employee_name, transaction_date FROM assets JOIN transactions ON assets.asset_id = transactions.asset_id JOIN employees ON transactions.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM assets
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, purchase_price FROM assets WHERE purchase_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_price DESC
SELECT asset_name, current_location FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Computer' AND current_location='Office Building'

SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, a.asset_name, t.transaction_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN transactions t ON e.employee_id = t.employee_id INNER JOIN assets a ON t.asset_id = a.asset_id WHERE e.department='IT' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC

SELECT a.asset_name, e.employee_name, t.transaction_date, t.return_date FROM transactions t INNER JOIN assets a ON t.asset_id = a.asset_id INNER JOIN employees e ON t.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE t.return_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM asset;
SELECT asset_name, quantity FROM asset WHERE asset_type='Computer';
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE department='Engineering' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, location FROM asset WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee WHERE department='Sales' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset;
SELECT asset_name, quantity, location FROM asset ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM asset WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, location FROM asset WHERE location LIKE '%Floor%';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employee WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, purchase_date FROM assets;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees;
SELECT asset_name, asset_location FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Computer';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='Purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT asset_name, asset_location FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Laptop' ORDER BY asset_location DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
